Content.Text:
<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! <MYNAME>. You've dropped by at the
perfect time.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I just baked a cake from a new recipe. Would
you care to give it a taste?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_L>Sorry...I forgot to add the lemon glaze.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT>I'm glad to know it's good without it, but it
should be much tastier with.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, well. What's done is done! Sorry to serve
you an incomplete dish.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Once I've perfected it enough to put it on my
menu, how about you come by and try it again?
<PAGE>
And thanks for the vote of confidence, either
way. Made an ambitious chef proud, it did!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm? Lemon...? AH!! I can't believe it! I forgot
to add the lemon glaze! I'm so sorry!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll go get it right now. Hang on just a second!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L>It's good? That's fantastic. I'm really glad to hear
it.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT>I think it's pretty good without the glaze, but the
tang of the lemon truly does help bring out its
rich flavor.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You've got a good sense of taste if you caught
on to that, <MYNAME>. Maybe you've got a
budding chef in you, just waiting to come out!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L><FACE_LAUGH>Talking to someone with a finer understanding
of taste is truly invigorating. Thank you so
much, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Once I finally add this to my menu, I hope you'll
come by and try it again. I'll be looking forward
to it!
